content.rendered:
A Small and Simple script to get all the server status from the weblogic domain, Including AdminServer & Managed Server.

The Jython Script


How to Execute this script

Copy the preceding script content to a file, let’s say /tmp/get_wls_serverstate.py

cd domain/bin
. ./setDomainEnv.sh
java weblogic.WLST /tmp/get_wls_serverstate.py

Script Output

 Hope this helps.

Cheers

A K S A R A V

Write to us at : aksarav@mwinventory.in

 Follow us on Facebook

 To Join our Community in Whatsapp – Click here
